description:
Local control for updating and editing Windows images and deployments.

Integrate updates, drivers, automate Windows and application setup, speedup Windows deployment process and have it all set for the next time.
New

Image: Edition changer, right-click – Edit – Edition
Unattended: Unattended inputs for ‘Support App URL’, ‘Support Provider’, ‘Trade-in URL’, ‘Recycle URL’

Upgrade

UI: "Services" and "Extra Services" pages combined into the Settings page tabs
Components: "Display Policy Service" removes more into a 32-bit split
Components: "Token Broker" and "Capability Access Manager" 32-bit split
Components: "Legacy games" compatibility option
UI-Translation: Thanks for French (tistou77), Hungarian (John), Italian (clarensio), Russian (RDS)

Fix

Updates: MSIX Apply – Reapply propagation fix, it was only applied to the main image
UI: Multi instance support fix
